message.name: SUPERVISOR_REASSIGNTASK_SELECTION_EMPTY
message.locale: You have not selected any tasks.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_REASSIGNTASK_USERNAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Please select a user to reserve tasks for.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_REASSIGNTASK_USERNAME_MULTIPLEVALUES
message.locale: Please select one user to reserve tasks for only.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_REASSIGNTASK_USER_INACTIVE
message.locale: User %1s is not an active user, and tasks cannot be reserved for this user.
